title: Login portal blocked!!
content: What the actual fff , Even the login portal is blocked (by sophos),🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 pes🤡🤡

comments.body: Okay now what do you want to say?

Its working..... IMPORTANT NOTICE: login captive portal issue with chrome browser. Please login with a alternate browser (Firefox or edge) 192.168.254.1:8090
This is what the portal says for now
Here's a solution. Close any other login portal tabs and clear history and reconnect, it will work properly.
